title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: CALL-Based Mathematical Project Learning Design in Digital Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Students can systematically analyze complex mathematical problems and produce project deliverables using Computer-Assisted Language Learning (CALL) tools
Learners can improve mathematical modeling skills by over 30% through project-based activities
Teams demonstrate critical thinking by deriving optimized solutions through five or more iterative design processes
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
